name: BRX Unified UI Integration
introduction: Prepares your project to use BRX Unified UI Integration, including IAM (Identity and Access Management), which provides integrated Single Sign-On and User Provisioning features for enterprise BRX customers.
description: Please note that this component is a BRX-only component. Adding this component to the community version, or in a brXM project that is not configured for the integrated BRX product, is not supported.
